name: Tires
shortDesc: Bontrager R3 Hard-Case Lite Road Tire. A lightly-treaded road tire with proprietary TR-Speed compound and improved Hard-Case Lite puncture protection for unmatched speed, confidence, and durability.

name: Tubes
shortDesc: Bontrager Fat and + Schrader Valve Bicycle Tube. An inner tube for fat bikes, built with the Hodag and Jackalope in mind.

name: Wheels
shortDesc: A sub-1300g cross country race wheel with a 29mm rim width that delivers all the performance of a wider rim without the weight.

name: Handlebars
shortDesc: An integrated bar and stem combo that cleanly and securely holds cables for a refined look and added aerodynamics.

name: Bike Front Light
shortDesc: A USB-rechargeable front light with five modes for day and night and enough power to light up the full width of any trail.

name: Moble Hendler
shortDesc: A smartphone bike mount is a worthy investment for any commuter, cyclist or weekend warrior who prefers his or her phone at the ready.
